settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subtitle: Everything you need to know about StudyFuel

settings.question: How much does StudyFuel cost?
settings.answer: We have 4 plans: Free ($0), Quick Prep Pack ($5/month), Full Semester Plan ($12/month), and Coaching + Community ($20/month). All paid plans can be cancelled anytime with no fees.

settings.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
settings.answer: Yes! You can cancel anytime with one click. No questions asked, no cancellation fees. If you cancel within 30 days, we'll refund your payment.

settings.question: What equipment do I need?
settings.answer: Most of our recipes work with just a microwave! We label recipes by equipment needed: microwave-only, hot plate, or full kitchen. You can filter recipes based on what you have available.

settings.question: Are the recipes really quick?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We know you're busy. Most recipes take 5-15 minutes. We include prep time and difficulty level for every recipe. Our Quick Prep Pack specializes in meals under 15 minutes.

settings.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions?
settings.answer: Yes! You can filter recipes for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, and other common restrictions. Our quiz helps identify the best plan for your dietary needs.

settings.question: What if I don't like the recommended plan?
settings.answer: No problem! The quiz is just a suggestion. You can choose any plan you want, and you can switch between plans anytime. We want you in the plan that fits YOUR needs.

settings.question: Is there a student discount?
settings.answer: Our entire service is already designed with student budgets in mind! Our most popular plan is just $12/month - less than two Chipotle burritos. Plus, the money you save on groceries more than pays for itself.

settings.question: How do I access my recipes?
settings.answer: Once you sign up, you'll get immediate access to your member dashboard. You can view recipes on any device - phone, tablet, or computer. All recipes are mobile-optimized for cooking.
